column4: Hello everyone. Everytime I try to export a file in Audacity, it hangs. I am using version 1.3.6 on Ubuntu 10-10
Did you try to test it with tine size project (few secondsof flat record), and any hint in logs?
Do you have it properly configured, cards and alsa?
It do not log (or at least I unaware of it), check messages, etc, if it is hardware connected it will be there.
Bug was reported already, maybe there is a fix. or try with jack (not sure that there is any recent how to)
